name: Rock Bottom Bomber
description:
You are a bomber in a row boat, and must throw bombs down into the water to blow up every single rock. Yellow rocks reward you with more bombs,  and the black ones are explosive! 

Use the arrow keys to move left and right. Press space to drop bombs.

Submission for the Cactus Game Jam.

Week 10 game for my Rapid Prototyping class.
Theme: Under the Sea
Constraints: Must use physics, must be in an enclosed space(box)

Credits:
